title: Wallpaper mag: Niemeyer tribute title font?
content:
Hi everyone,

I am trying to find out what font Wallpaper mag used for the title of their recent Oscar Niemeyer tribute.

Thanks for your help!

Tina

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130222063034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Wallpaper_title%20font_3529.jpg)
author: Tinak

comments.content:
Yep, Copan by Julia.  
You can check it out here...  
 [http://www.julia.uk.com/en/projects/copan/](http://web.archive.org/web/20130222063034/http:/www.julia.uk.com/en/projects/copan/ "http://www.julia.uk.com/en/projects/copan/")
I don't believe that Copan is available as a font, but only as raster alphabet components.

Unlikely to be raster - maybe a set of outlines.

hhp
Very neat! I am curious if it's available for download and use? It doesn't appear to be from Julia's site.
